title: Amazon API Gateway HTTP API to SQS to Lambda
description: This pattern creates an HTTP API endpoint that send message to SQS and trigger a Lambda function to process the message

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The API Gateway handles the incoming API requests and send the ```$request.body.MessageBody``` as a message to SQS queue.
A Lambda function will be trigger upon the message arraived.
Processing the message in Lambda function based on your need.
